name: Aslan's Sci Fi
description:
These embeddings are trained on classic Sci-fi action movies from the 70s to the 2000s. I ultimately wanted something that could combine the classic scifi aesthetic and the realism of live action cinematography.

--------

To use these embeddings in AUTOMATIC1111, copy them to your embeddings folder in your stable-diffusion-webui directory. No need to restart, just invoke the embedding from your prompt. Make sure you are using a compatible model or you will get errors!

--------

The Sci-fi embeddings were all trained on 465 768x768 images that were cropped and tagged using BLIP for training.
--------

Like most other 2.1 textual inversions this works best when paired up with other embeddings and good negative prompting.

modelVersions.name: aslanscifi-v2
modelVersions.description: Extended training to 1800 steps before I reached the point where my poor 3080 couldn't go any further. I will continue training this model till it is perfectly cohesive. First example uses some img2img to clean the face but every other example is raw txt2img.

modelVersions.name: aslanscifi-v1
modelVersions.description:
As far as I could get before my RunPod account ran out of money haha!
Batch size of 48 and Gradient accumulation of 10.
I plan on extending training out to 5000 steps
